attributes.action: fine any football team whose supporters riot a minimum of five million pounds, and ban them from playing for a minimum of one year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the current cult of football and the wasting of unlimited public money on the London Olympics do nothing for athletic activity in this country. Football and Olympics now have nothing to do with sportsmanship, and everything to do with corruption and the unlimited power of money.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
